My problem with Galloway is not with his guilt or innocence. I don't know enough or understand the facts to be able to make a judgment. However, I greatly resent this pompous arrogant ahole coming into an august body of the U.S. Congress and going into political diatribes like he did. He was treated with respect by our Congress and he treated them like he was talking to a bunch of kindergarten children and assuming he could get away with it. If he tried this crapola in a U.S. courtroom he would be cited for contempt of court and thrown in the county jail.
